marketing: RDSS Samvera is pleased to offer repository solutions using
We can help you from initial requirements, through customisation and integration with your systems, to long term support and maintenance.
Whether you are a small institution looking to get the essential features out-of-the-box, or a large, research-intensive
organisation looking for customisations and integration with local systems, don't hesitate to
contact us to find out what we can do for you.
